wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Lynn James (born 15 April 1996) is a Welsh professional footballer who plays as a defender for English League Two club Leyton Orient. James has previously played for Cardiff City, Yeovil Town, Hibernian, Wigan Athletic and Salford City.

response: Thomas James (c. 1573–1629) was an English librarian and Anglican clergyman.
*General Thomas James (1782–1847), trapper who served in the Illinois Legislature, was a General in the Illinois Militia, and served in the Black Hawk War
*Thomas James (minister) (1804–1891), former slave who wrote a short memoir
*Thomas James (businessman) (born 1940s), American businessman, chairman of Raymond James
Thomas James (born 17 October 1988) is an English footballer who plays as a defender.
